articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung). 
					 He, together with commanding officers of the KPA, entered the hall where the statues of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are standing.
					
					 Placed before the statues was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Also laid before the statues was a floral basket in the name of the KPA.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, together with visitors, paid high tribute to the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He entered the hall where Kim Il Sung lies in state.
					
					 He, together with visitors, paid homage to Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He went round the hall where orders Kim Il Sung received are on display and the halls that house a train coach and car used by him.
					
					 He entered the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state.
					
					 He, together with visitors, paid homage to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He went round the hall where orders Kim Jong Il received are on display, the mourning hall and the halls that house a car, electric car, boat and train coach used by him.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts U.S. Annual "Human Rights Report"
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts U.S. Annual "Human Rights Report"
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Friday in connection with the fact that the U.S. slandered the DPRK in an annual "human rights report":
					 On April 13 the U.S. State Department in the "2015 country human rights report" reeled off again a string of ungrounded calumnies against the DPRK's human rights performance.
					
					 The "negation of the right to freedom", "operation of political prisoners camp", "self-willed execution", "flesh trafficking", "forced labor", etc. the "human rights report" claimed exist in the DPRK are a whopping lie.
					
					 Every year the U.S. says this or that about human rights performance in other countries but the human rights abuser which should be taken to justice is none other than the U.S. 
					
					 The U.S. is the tundra of human rights where extreme racial discrimination and all kinds of crimes and world-shocking human rights abuses are rampant.
					
					 The U.S. makes no scruple of committing extreme human rights abuses including massacre of innocent people while getting engrossed in aggression and interference in different parts of the world.
					
					 The U.S. is a chief criminal that caused the "coloring revolution" in the Mid-east under the pretext of "defending human rights" that led to state subversion, civil conflicts and disastrous wars and the world's worst refugee incident.
					
					 It is unbecoming for the U.S. to style itself "human rights judge" while trying to conceal its despicable true colors as a kingpin of human rights abuses.
					
					 This time the U.S. talked rubbish about the human rights performance in 199 countries the world over but no one will lend an ear to such vicious remarks made by the U.S. which finds fault with others even though it has neither elementary qualifications nor justifications to talk about human rights performance.
					
					 The U.S. should refrain from doing rubbish paperwork like "human rights report" but had better wipe its nose with the paper.
					
					 The danger of the U.S. farce of publishing "human rights report" is that it is a means for aggression for bringing down social systems in other countries and realizing its hegemonic purpose through persistent intrigues.
					
					 The U.S. persistent racket about "human rights" in the DPRK is a hideous hostile act aimed to tarnish the international image of the DPRK, undermine its society and realize at any cost the ambition for "subversion of its social system".
					
					 Now that the U.S. resorts to the all-out pressure on the DPRK while taking issue with the "human rights" along with the military threats aimed at "regime change" and sanctions against the DPRK, it will take all necessary measures to cope with them to make the U.S. bitterly regret of its act.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, on April 13.
					 The president in the message said:
					
					 We are glad to extend the warmest congratulations and best wishes to Your Excellency and, through you, to the friendly Korean people on the significant occasion of the 104th birth anniversary of eternal HE President Kim Il Sung, the great leader, and on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and the State of Palestine.
					
					 The DPRK, which is among the early states that forged diplomatic relations with Palestine, has supported the national right of our people in all international arenas and developed the DPRK-Palestine friendly and cooperative relations even before the establishment of diplomatic relations.
					
					 Our Palestinian people struggling to retake the national right and build an independent state amid the support of our brothers and friends led by your country are proud of the historic relations with your friendly country and highly estimate the invariable stand taken by your country to the just cause of the Palestinian people.
					
					 Extending the warmest congratulations to Your Excellency, I sincerely wish you good health and happiness.
					
					 I also wish the friendly Korean people greater progress and prosperity and hope that the relations of friendship and solidarity between the peoples of our two countries will steadily develop.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Myanmar President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Myanmar President
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Htin Kyaw, president of the Republic of the Union of Myanmar, on April 8.
					 The message extended the sincere congratulations and the greatest wishes to His Excellency and, through him, to the people of the DPRK on April 15, 2016, the 104th birth anniversary of HE Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Ugandan President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni on April 6.
					 The message extended the warmest greetings to Kim Jong Un and the government and people of the DPRK on behalf of the president, government and people of Uganda on the occasion of the 104th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun.
					
					 Kim Il Sung turned the DPRK into a country whose people are more closely united with his devoted service for the Korean people and achieved socio-economic development, it said.
					
					 Highly praising his career and great exploits, it expressed hope that the good relations with Kim Jong Un and the government and people of the DPRK would continue to develop on good terms.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and the Korean people sustained prosperity.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from C.C., AINDF
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from C.C., AINDF
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on April 15, the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 The congratulatory message said that the President was born in Pyongyang, the holy city of the nation, on April 15, Juche 1 (1912) and explored the road for the era of independence, weathering the stern tempest of history and led it to victory. The more than eight decades-long life of the President is shining as the sacred one of the distinguished leader, peerless patriot and great revolutionary who adorned the 20th century as the victorious one of the socialist cause and the cause of independence against imperialism, enjoying absolute support and trust from the people, the message noted, and went on:
					
					 Now the DPRK is basked in the glow of world attention as a powerful socialist fortress which is dignified with independence, remains rich and strong thanks to self-support and emerges victorious thanks to self-defence and the people-centered socialist country envied by all people. This is the precious fruition of the outstanding leadership of the great President who devoted himself to the victory of the revolution only.
					
					 The idea and cause of the fatherly President were successfully carried forward thanks to ardent loyalty, scientific wisdom and enthusiastic leadership of the great General Kim Jong Il. Now the DPRK is greeting a new era of leap forward thanks to you respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, another peerlessly great man acclaimed by the Korean nation.
					
					 Under the leadership of you, the best in idea and leadership, personality and virtues, the DPRK is demonstrating before the world the might of single-mindedly united politico-ideological power, matchless military power with the strongest nuclear deterrence and youth power without an equal in the world. Under the unfurled banner of the principle of giving priority to self-development the DPRK has ushered in a fresh Mallima era doing 10 years' work in one year and is bringing about epoch-making miracles and dramatic changes in building a socialist economic giant and a highly civilized nation.
					
					 The prospect of the cause of national independence is bright and the historic day when all Koreans would enjoy all blessings in the dignified, prosperous and reunified country is sure to dawn as there are precious patriotic legacy of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu for reunification and the great programme for independent reunification advanced by you Marshal Kim Jong Un, the illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Letter from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Letter from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Friday, the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 The letter said the birth of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was not only the great fortune as it meant the rise of the sun of Juche for the first time in the 5 000 year- long history of the nation but an event in the world history in which the era of independence dawned in the struggle of the Korean people and progressive mankind.
					
					 The letter praised him as a benefactor of national resurrection as he brought the joy of national liberation to the Koreans in Japan who lived in tears as a stateless nation and enabled them to be full-fledged overseas citizens of Juche Korea.
					
					 As the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il wisely led the work of Chongryon to brilliant victory while steering the revolutionary cause of Juche as the most faithful successor to the immortal revolutionary idea and cause of the President and took utmost care of Chongryon and compatriots in Japan, Chongryon could demonstrate the honor of being a model in the world overseas compatriots' movement, the letter said.
					
					 The letter noted that under the leadership of Kim Jong Un the DPRK is making dynamic progress towards the final victory in the drive for the building of a thriving nation and in the all-out confrontation with the U.S. and the movement of Koreans in Japan has entered the historic development stage of ushering in a new heyday for the happiness of Koreans in Japan and future of their younger generation.
					
					 The letter said that the Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan will more dynamically demonstrate before the whole world the might of Chongryon grown strong under the care of the great leaders this significant year when the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is to be held.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Leading officials of the party and state visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Friday, the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 Among the visitors were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party and officials of the party and power organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Seen standing before the statues of the great leaders was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 Also seen standing before them was a floral basket in the name of the KPA.
					
					 Laid there was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the DPRK National Defence Commission, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 The participants paid high tribute to the great leaders.
					
					 They made bows to the great leaders who lie.
					
					They went round the halls where the orders the great leaders received are on display and halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Titles of KPA Marshal and Vice Marshal Awarded to KPA Commanding Officers
articles.content:
Titles of KPA Marshal and Vice Marshal Awarded to KPA Commanding Officers
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The title of Marshal of the Korean People's Army was warded to Kim Yong Chun and Hyon Chol Hae and the title of Vice Marshal of the KPA to Ri Myong Su on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. They are commanding officers of the KPA.
					 They have made great contributions to thoroughly establishing the party's monolithic commanding system in the KPA and strengthening the revolutionary armed forces into the army of the party and the leader by remaining faithful to the party's Songun revolutionary leadership while working at the important posts of the KPA for a long period under the special trust and love of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 A relevant decision in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea and the National Defence Commission of the DPRK was published on Thursday.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan for Celebrating Day of Sun Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Chairman of Italian General Investment Group Pay Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Friday, the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of the President).
					 He laid a large floral basket before the statues and paid tribute to them.
					
					 On the same day, staff members of the Chinese embassy here laid a floral basket before the statues.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Organizations, Figure
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Organizations, Figure
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from the Asia-Pacific regional preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Oceanic regional preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Australian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, Yuwen Middle School in Jilin, China and Ibrahim Mantu, chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, on Friday, the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and portraits of the smiling great leaders across the country on Friday, the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of the President).
					 Seen standing before the statues on Mansu Hill was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army(KPA).
					
					 Placed there were floral baskets in the names of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, industrial establishments and schools at all levels here and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Also laid before the statues was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the statues of the great leaders.
					
					 Floral baskets in the names of units of the KPA, institutions and enterprises were placed before the statues of the great leaders and portraits of the smiling great leaders at Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and the Mansudae Art Studio.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children visited the statues of the great leaders and portraits of the smiling great leaders in their residential areas and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Banquet Given to Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
Banquet Given to Mark Day of Sun
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A banquet was given at the People's Palace of Culture Friday in celebration of the 104th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other leading officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the armed forces organs, officials of ministries and national institutions, institutions and industrial establishments in Pyongyang city who distinguished themselves in the 70-day campaign of loyalty, those who had the honor of being received by the great leaders, those related to revolutionary activities of the great leaders, people of merits, congratulatory groups and delegations of overseas Koreans, overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here and their spouses, military attaches of foreign embassies here and their spouses and foreign guests. 
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a speech at the banquet.
					
					 He praised the President for founding the Juche idea, building a Juche-oriented revolutionary party, matchless revolutionary armed forces and Korean-style socialism centred on popular masses, opening up a bright prospect for national reunification and making undying contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					 The President's life-long devotion to the people was given continuity by leader Kim Jong Il's high-intensity forced march and is being carried on by Marshal Kim Jong Un, he noted.
					
					 He underlined the need to push ahead the revolution and construction in line with the requirement of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, and develop the party, state and army into the ones of the great leaders to the letter, holding them in high esteem as the sun of Juche.
					
					 He referred to the stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to certainly achieve the historic cause of national reunification, behests of the great leaders, develop the external relations in the idea of independence, peace and friendship and make positive efforts for the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Chairman of Italian General Investment Group Pay Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Chairman of Italian General Investment Group Pay Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Friday, the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of the President).
					 He laid a large floral basket before the statues and paid tribute to them.
					
					 On the same day, staff members of the Chinese embassy here laid a floral basket before the statues.

articles.title: Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Foreigners and overseas Koreans visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Friday, the Day of the Sun (President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary.)
					 They included members of foreign  diplomatic missions and international bodies and military attaches here, followers of the Juche idea, a delegation of the political party "Aalam-party of non-parties" of Kyrgyzstan, a delegation of the Moscow City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Sun, a congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China and participants of the 18th Kimilsungia Festival.
					
					 They paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They paid homage to the great leaders who lie in state.
					
					 They looked round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 That day the chief and members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay homage to the great leaders.

articles.title: Schoolchildren's Performance Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
Schoolchildren's Performance Mark Day of Sun
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Members of the art groups of the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace gave a performance on Friday, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 It began with narration accompanied by song and dance "The Day of the Sun Shines thanks to the Marshal". Put on the stage were serial song "We Are Happy under Care of Marshal Kim Il Sung" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers impressively represented the boundless reverence for Kim Il Sung who devoted himself to schoolchildren all his life.
					
					 Also put on the stage were numbers showing the devotion of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il who is bringing up the members of the Children's Union to be true sons and daughters unfailingly loyal to the party and the socialist country.
					
					 The performers successfully represented the great pride and optimism of the school children who are dynamically advancing toward the rosy future under the care of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, officials concerned, officials of the league, school youth and children in the city.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit Kimilsungia Festival Venue
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit Kimilsungia Festival Venue
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here and the followers of the Juche idea including the secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and his party visited the venue of the 18th Kimilsungia Festival on Friday, the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 They looked round the immortal flowers in full bloom as the famous flower of praising the great man at the festival venue.

articles.title: Koreans Significantly Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
Koreans Significantly Mark Day of Sun
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK significantly marked the auspicious Day of the Sun, the greatest national holiday (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 Huge crowds of people visited the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute, looking up to the portraits of the smiling great leaders.
					
					 Service personnel and people of all social standings including youths and students also visited statues and portraits of the smiling great leaders on Mansu Hill and other parts of the country and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The venues of the 18th Kimilsungia Festival in Pyongyang and the provincial Kimilsungia exhibitions were also crowded with visitors.
					
					 Performances were given at theatres, cultural halls and open-air stages in Pyongyang and provinces, adding to the festive mood.
					
					 Dancing parties of youths and students and members of the women's union were held in different parts of the country.
					
					 Diverse celebrations including art performances were also held at factories, farms and construction sites across the country.
					
					 Lots of pupils joined the Korean Children's Union.
					
					 Public catering network in Pyongyang and other parts of the country were lively with working people.

articles.title: Joint Performances of Art Festival Given
articles.content:
Joint Performances of Art Festival Given
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Joint performances of the participants in the 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival were given at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre and the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre Friday.
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yong Chol and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of ministries and national institutions and working people in the city.
					
					 Watching the performances together with them were overseas Koreans, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations, military attaches and members of foreign embassies here and foreign guests.
					
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers including songs, instrumental music and dances by artistes of various countries and overseas Korean artistes.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who brightly indicated the road to be taken in the era of independence with the bright rays of the sun.
					
					 Giving deep impressions were chorus and dance and male solo and dance given by the State Academic Voronezh Russian Folk Choir, dance by the State Art Troupe of Vietnam and song and dance by the Flamenco Band of Spain as they vividly represented the national emotion, feelings and life of the peoples of their countries. 
					
					 National instrumental duet of the State Art Troupe of Vietnam, piano trio of the Chamber Trio Group of the Khabarovsk Territorial Symphony Orchestra of Russia and other numbers truthfully portrayed the feelings of the Korean people to love the country and add glory to it.
					
					 The repertoire also included numbers given by the State Academic Classic Ballet Group of Russia, the Fresco Harmonica Instrumental Group of Malaysia and overseas Korean artistes.

articles.title: Fireworks Displayed on Day of Sun
articles.content:
Fireworks Displayed on Day of Sun
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Fireworks were displayed in Pyongyang Friday, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 People including youths and students thronged Kim Il Sung Square, Mansu Hill and Okryu Bridge over the Taedong River.
					
					 Amid the playing of song "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" fireworks exploded, brightening the nocturnal sky.
					
					 Fireworks of various colors and shapes were displayed like confetti amid songs "Forward, Country of Invincibility" and "Our Faith", adding to the festive mood.
					
					 The fascinating fireworks giving off bright rays seemed to demonstrate to the world the harmonious whole of the army and people of the DPRK united around supreme leader Kim Jong Un, which is the strongest national power of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea.

articles.title: Cyprus Musician Enjoys Popularity at Pyongyang Art Festival
articles.content:
Cyprus Musician Enjoys Popularity at Pyongyang Art Festival
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival is now going on here with the attendance of many Korean and foreign artistes.
					 Among those participants is Adamos Katsantonis heading a musical company of Cyprus, who has attended the festival 13 times.
					
					 He composed for the current festival piano concerto "Juche", which touches the hearts of audience.
					
					 The piano concerto represents the world people's boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung who fathered the Juche idea to show the road ahead of mankind.
					
					 After concluding the concerto with melody of immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung", Adamos Katsantonis said this is his whole family's favorite song and he deeply reveres the great leaders of the DPRK.

articles.title: Vietnam State Art Troup Applauded at Art Festival
articles.content:
Vietnam State Art Troup Applauded at Art Festival
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The State Art Troupe of Vietnam has left a deep impression on the Korean people through its performances in Pyongyang as part of the ongoing 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					 The troupe consists of dancers, instrumentalists and vocalists of Vietnam's National Song and Dance Theatre and National Conservatory.
					
					 Its numbers include immortal classic masterpiece "Song of Loyalty", "The Glow over Kangson" and "Sing, Fork to Mangyongdae", Korean songs in praise of President Kim Il Sung, as well as dance pieces and folk songs showing the Vietnamese people's mental world and assiduity.
					
					 Through its performances, the troupe represented the Vietnamese people's deep reverence for Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Stamps Celebrating Day of Sun Issued
articles.content:
Stamps Celebrating Day of Sun Issued
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea released four individual stamps on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The stamps reflect Order of Kim Il Sung, Kim Il Sung Prize, Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize and Kim Il Sung Children Honor Prize which carry the portrait of the smiling President. They are the top order and top prizes of the DPRK.
					
					 Seen in the lower part of the stamps are letters "Revised on June 20, Juche 101 (2012)".

articles.title: Joint National Meeting of KCU Organizations Held
articles.content:
Joint National Meeting of KCU Organizations Held
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union organizations took place before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at Changdok School in Pyongyang on Friday, his 104th birth anniversary.
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Su Gil, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, officials of the youth league, officials concerned, war veterans and persons of merits.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, said the history of love for the younger generation and future shown by Kim Il Sung who successfully trained the reserves of the revolution has been given a steady continuity thanks to leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He called on all KCU members to make proud successes in their study, organizational life, socio-political activities and do-good-thing movement this year marking the 70th birthday of the KCU and thus prepare themselves to be genuine KCU members of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea dynamically advancing under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Then followed a KCU admission ceremony.
					
					 The new KCU members took an oath led by Choe Ryong Hae.
					
					 Officials, war veterans and persons of merits put red ties around their necks and pinned KCU badges on their clothes.
					
					 The new KCU members made the first salute of the KCU members, responding to the slogan of "Let us be always ready for socialist country!"
					
					 Congratulatory speeches were made.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Meet to Celebrate Day of Sun
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Meet to Celebrate Day of Sun
Tokyo, April 15 (KNS-KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of Koreans in Japan at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on April 14 to celebrate the 104th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), in a report said that Marshal Kim Jong Un sent educational aid fund and stipends amounting to 218. 8 million yen to the Chongryon on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 He extended the greatest and highest thanks to Kim Jong Un reflecting the loyalty of all the officials of Chongryon, Koreans in Japan and teaching staff and all students of Korean University.
					
					 He praised the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung's revolutionary career and feats, adding:
					
					 His undying idea, feats and warm patriotism and compatriotic feeling were steadily carried forward by the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, throwing more bright rays.
					
					 The Juche cause and the Juche-based overseas compatriots movement have entered a new historic stage under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The reporter called upon all the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan to turn out as one in the drive to defend and glorify the great leaders' idea of the Juche-based overseas compatriots movement and leadership feats and usher in a fresh heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place across the DPRK on Friday, the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 Dancing parties started to the tune of the song "Let's Sing of the Day of the Sun" at the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and the Arch of Triumph and other venues in Pyongyang.
					
					 They presented dances, looking back on the revolutionary career of the President who dedicated himself to the prosperity of the country, happiness of its people, bright future of the younger generation, regarding it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 The rhythmic songs "We Will Devote Our Youth to the Country" and "Youth and Courage" were played to rev up the festive atmosphere.
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in provinces, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Great Feats for Global Independence
articles.content:
Great Feats for Global Independence
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung of the DPRK had conducted energetic external activities for global independence, performing great feats for the times and history.
					 In his lifetime he met at least 70,000 foreigners, including more than 400 party, state and government leaders of 136 countries to give precious teachings.
					
					 Among them was Samora Moises Machel, president of Mozambique.
					
					 Kim Il Sung had talks with Machel seeking a way for the Mozambican national liberation for hours to tell about the experiences he gained in leading the Korean revolution and construction. They included the matters related to the building of independent national economy, the agricultural cooperativization, the training of national army and cadres, the ideological education of the popular masses and foreign relations.
					
					 Those state leaders also included Robert G. Mugabe of Zimbabwe.
					
					 It was in May Juche 67 (1978) that he visited Pyongyang for the first time to find a way for his country's liberation and independence.
					
					 Kim Il Sung showed him the concrete ways for bringing earlier the final victory in the Zimbabwean people's struggle of liberation and independence. And he gave an encouragement to Mugabe, stating that the Zimbabwean people's revolutionary struggle would surely emerge victorious and the DPRK would assist them until they win in their armed struggle.
					
					 The President also rendered mental and material assistance to the victorious revolution and socialist construction in Cuba, the Vietnamese people's anti-U.S. national salvation resistance and the economic construction in African countries.
					
					 His great feats for mankind's cause of independence will remain forever in the world history.

articles.title: World-startling Chollima Age in DPRK
articles.content:
World-startling Chollima Age in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are now recalling the Chollima age brought in the country under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung, with the Day of the Sun, his birthday, as an occasion.
					 In the difficult postwar period the President decided to overcome manifold hardships and trials in reliance upon the popular masses' strength.
					
					 So, he visited the Kangson Steel Plant in December Juche 45 (1956) to arouse its workers to a great revolutionary upsurge, saying it would be good for the country if it has 10,000 tons of rolled steel in addition.
					
					 In response to his appealing call, the workers of Kangson launched the Chollima Movement based on self-reliance and turned out 120,000 tons of rolled steel at a blooming mill with capacity of 60,000 tons.
					
					 Under the slogan "Charge at the speed of Chollima!" all other people in the country joined the steel workers in the Chollima Movement and had wrought such miracles as manufacturing large-size water pump, tractor, excavator, 3000-ton press, bulldozer, electric locomotive and other kinds of machinery and vehicles in a short span of time and building a flat in a matter of 14 minutes.
					
					 Through this movement, the DPRK people carried out the socialist industrialization within 14 years.
					
					 Collectivism of helping and leading forward each other pervaded the whole country under the slogan "One for all and all for one!" and the spirit of Chollima Korea was also displayed in sports, literature and arts and other fields.
					
					 The Chollima age, provided by President Kim Il Sung, had turned ordinary workers, peasants and intellectuals into ardent patriots, able persons in creation and construction and persons strong in self-reliance.
					
					 To commemorate this era, the Chollima Statue was erected in the capital city of Pyongyang on April 15, 1961, as a monument displaying the heroic stamina of the Korean people and a symbol of the DPRK.

articles.title: First-term Camping of Children Starts in DPRK
articles.content:
First-term Camping of Children Starts in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The first-term camping started at the children's camps of the DPRK on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 There took place a meeting for starting the camping at the Songdowon International Children's Camp on Friday.
					
					 Similar meetings were held at the children's camps across the country including the Sokam Children's Camp and the Sohungho Children's Camp.

articles.title: Lecture of Chongryon Given
articles.content:
Lecture of Chongryon Given
Tokyo, April 15 (KNS-KCNA) -- A lecture of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) was given at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on April 14 to celebrate the 104th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were officials of Chongryon and teaching staff and students of Korean University.
					
					 The participants watched video lecture "Our Leader Who Created Large Flower Garden of National Education".

articles.title: Telemedicine System for Koryo Medicine Established in DPRK
articles.content:
Telemedicine System for Koryo Medicine Established in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Telemedicine system for traditional Koryo medical treatment was established in the DPRK.
					 A network was built up for the system between the Academy of Koryo Medicine in Pyongyang and Koryo medicine hospitals in provinces and municipalities.
					
					 The system consists of medical service for professionals and patients and glossary and data on Koryo medicines.
					
					 Telemedicine service began operating in the country in Juche 99 (2010).

articles.title: Sugar Sculpture Exhibition Held
articles.content:
Sugar Sculpture Exhibition Held
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A sugar sculpture exhibition took place at Chongryu Restaurant on Friday.
					 Presented to the exhibition were more than 450 sugar sculptures and at least 120 cake sculptures created by hundreds of technicians and cooks from 40 odd units.
					
					 Sugar and cake sculptures of Okryu Restaurant, Chongryu Restaurant, Kumsong Foodstuff Factory and Pyongyang Wheat Flour Processing Factory bore a close resemblance to art pieces.
					
					 Scuptures of provincial food factories also deeply impressed the visitors.
					
					 There were demonstration performances by cooks and technicians of units which proved successful at the exhibition.

articles.title: Newspapers Call for Achieving Prosperity of Great Paektusan Nation
articles.content:
Newspapers Call for Achieving Prosperity of Great Paektusan Nation
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Newspapers here Friday carry editorials on the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They say that for the army and people of the DPRK April 15 is the day of a great fortune of the nation when they acclaimed him as the founding father of socialist Korea and the sun of Juche and a revolutionary holiday which helps them renew the will to advance along the road of Juche indicated by him to the last.
					
					 He was the outstanding leader whom the Korean people acclaimed for the first time in history spanning five thousand years and the sun of Juche always alive in the hearts of all people, Rodong Sinmun notes, and goes on:
					
					 In the whole period of leading the revolution he held high the banner of independence and settled all problems arising in the revolution and construction in conformity with the requirements of the Korean revolution, interests of the Koreans and specific conditions of Korea.
					
					 The Korean People's Army is demonstrating its might as the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army giving steady continuity to the tradition of victory of Songun Korea and it has turned into a nuclear weapons state of Juche. This would be unthinkable apart from the wise guidance of the President who laid the eternal foundation for victory and prosperity of the nation, taking the arms of revolution all his life.
					
					 Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses is the greatest patriotic legacy established and left by him all his life.
					
					 His august name is a symbol of the invincible Korean revolution and his beaming image like the sun is the banner of victory and glory of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 The newspaper calls for getting united close around Marshal Kim Jong Un and more dynamically advancing toward the prosperity of the great Paektusan nation along the road of Juche.
					
					 Minju Joson says the future of the DPRK is bright and the socialist cause of Juche, the cause of building a thriving nation is sure to win as there are the army and people of the DPRK faithfully carrying forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem.

articles.title: Ruling Party Heavily Defeated in "National Assembly" Election in S. Korea
articles.content:
Ruling Party Heavily Defeated in "National Assembly" Election in S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- There took place a "National Assembly" election in south Korea Wednesday.
					 The ruling "Saenuri Party" suffered a heavy defeat in the election as majority of seats went to the Dobulo Democratic Party, the Party of People and other opposition parties.
					
					 As a result, the Dobulo Democratic Party became the leading party in the "National Assembly."
					
					The leadership of the ruling party admitted the defeat and expressed the will to step down.

articles.title: S. Korean Online Paper Urges People Not to Forget Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Online Paper Urges People Not to Forget Ferry Sewol Disaster
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- An article contributed by a journalist on the lapse of two years since the ferry Sewol disaster was posted on the south Korean online paper Oh My News on April 12.
					 Two years have passed since the ferry Sewol disaster but the disaster is still fresh in the memories of the south Koreans, the article noted.
					
					 Major media were vying with each other to report the "government" was doing its utmost to rescue victims, the article recalled, adding that the "government's" announcement of the start of the rescue operation turned out to be a lie.
					
					 The article urged the people not to forget the ferry Sewol disaster.

articles.title: S. Korean Newspaper Condemns Ruler for Threatening People
articles.content:
S. Korean Newspaper Condemns Ruler for Threatening People
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- An editorial posted on the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on April 13 condemned south Korean puppet ruler Park Geun Hye for openly threatening the people.
					 At the "state council meeting" on April 12 Park said the opposition parties should be punished as they took issue with the ruling party working to keep alive the economy, the editorial said, adding: This is in line with the contents touted by the "Saenuri Party".
					
					 She also said that if south Korea suffers the second economic crisis, the people are to be blamed for it, the editorial noted, adding this is a threat to the people.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Suppressing Teachers Union
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Suppressing Teachers Union
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Trade Union of Education and Culture of the DPRK released a statement Friday criticizing the south Korean Park Geun Hye regime's fascist suppression of the Teachers Union.
					 The statement said: The Park group, since it took office, mercilessly suppressed the union. Not content with it, it let a court deprive the union of its legal status and now has gone so far as to cut off its banking transactions and pressurize it to unconditionally fire its leading officials including its chairman.
					
					 The statement termed this crackdown an undisguised politically-motivated reprisal and undemocratic repressive act to completely eliminate the educators calling for righteous education for students and justice and truth against the unpopular educational policy of the puppet regime. 
					
					 The Park regime's move to stamp out the union should never be pardoned as it is a fascist violence to eliminate all the progressive and democratic forces supporting the June 15 joint declaration and calling for social democracy and independence, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 It would be a shortcut to defending justice and preventing the revival of the "yusin" fascist rule in south Korea to wipe out as soon as possible the Park group suppressing progressive educators by mobilizing fascist repressive bodies.
					
					 People of various circles in south Korea should turn out in the struggle to oust the fascist Park Geun Hye group of traitors from power as they are keen to trample down inviolable campus and revive the dark era of fascism, and in the drive to defend the union.
					
					 All teachers in the DPRK will always support the union in its dauntless struggle for genuine education for students, social democracy and national reunification against the unpopular education policy of the Park regime.

articles.title: S. Korean Student Deplores Society of No Future
articles.content:
S. Korean Student Deplores Society of No Future
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A wall-paper expressing curse and resentment at the south Korean society in which the puppet group of traitors are pursuing unpopular policies was pasted at Pusan University on April 11, according to the south Korean newspaper Seoul Sinmun.
					 It was reported that the wall-paper was written by a second-year student of a high school.
					
					 The wall-paper said the "government" abandoned victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army through the humiliating "agreement" with Japan on Dec. 28 last year.
					
					 Many children were sunken into deep sea on April 16, 2014, the unemployment hit record high and students are forced to study with "state-compiled textbooks", it noted.
					
					 Future is gloomy in south Korea, it added.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held in Various Countries
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held in Various Countries
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Seminars on exploits of President Kim Il Sung took place in Britain, Poland and Angola on April 2 and 6 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy lauded Kim Il Sung's revolutionary career as the one of the most tested and seasoned statesman, indomitable revolutionary and great man in the 20th century.
					
					 He said that the world does not know such a great man as Kim Il Sung who embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens and led the revolution and construction to victory amid the absolute support and trust of the popular masses.
					
					 The chief of the Polish branch of the Korean Friendship Association and other speakers lauded Kim Il Sung as the invincible and iron-willed commander and father of the Korean nation, saying that his birth anniversary is the most significant holiday not only for the Korean people but for the world progressives.
					
					 The editor of the Angolan newspaper Eme said that the Angolan people would not always forget the exploits Kim Il Sung performed by rendering positive support and encouragement to them in their struggle for national liberation and building of a new society.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in Poland.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed by Organizations of Guinea, Bulgaria, Mexico
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed by Organizations of Guinea, Bulgaria, Mexico
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different countries issued special bulletins from March 31 to April 5 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The Guinean preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun in an article titled "Eternal sun" said:
					
					 Why is the great President Kim Il Sung being revered as the sun? The august name of the President means the sun.
					
					 He indicated the way of mankind with bright smile on his face just like his august name and the sun, created the flower garden with warm enthusiasm and ardent human love and took care of all people with great attraction.
					
					 He founded the Juche idea, clearly indicating the way for mankind to follow.
					
					 The Juche idea has grasped the hearts of all people with its great vitality and attraction and gives strong impetus to the cause of global independence.
					
					 Though he passed away, his idea and feats are shining long just like the sun.
					
					 The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association and the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea in articles titled "104th birth anniversary of the great President Kim Il Sung" and "Smile of the sun" praised his sacred revolutionary career and undying feats.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Different Countries
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Norway, Bulgaria, Austria and Benin on April 6 and 7 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The participants laid bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, said that the President was the great revolutionary and thinker and theoretician who embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens and fathered the immortal Juche idea.
					
					 Vasilka Nikiforova, honorary chief of the Kim Il Sung Library in Sofia, Bulgaria expressed the will to give wide publicity to the undying exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the greatness of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Thomas Losh, secretary general of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK and chief of the Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, said the undying exploits performed by the President for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence would be always remembered by the Korean people and other progressives.
					
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live General Kim Jong Il" who doubles as chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said the President liberated Korea from the military occupation by the Japanese imperialists and turned it into an invulnerable socialist fortress independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings held in Norway, Bulgaria and Austria.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassies in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassies in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Foreign political parties, government and institute sent floral baskets to the DPRK embassies in relevant countries between March 26 and April 10 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 4th anniversary of the election of Marshal Kim Jong Un as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 They included the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, the government of Equatorial Guinea, the Khmer Democratic Party of Cambodia, the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar and the Myanmar Medical Research Institute.
					
					 Floral baskets sent by them were laid before portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Russia
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Russia
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated by the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK on April 7.
					 Revedev, chief of the group, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events to praise the sacred revolutionary careers and immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il between April 7, 2016 and April 30, 2017 and conduct brisk activities for supporting the Korean people in their just cause.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Observed by Russian Newspapers
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Observed by Russian Newspapers
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) and the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Komsomolskaya Pravda on April 5 devoted one whole page to an article titled "Smile of the sun" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Saying that the sun-like smile of the President can be seen everywhere in the DPRK, it noted that the Korean people have held the President in high esteem forever.
					
					 It stressed that the President's broad smile would always be remembered by the Korean people and progressive mankind along with the reality of the DPRK in which everything is undergoing a dramatic change and a leap forward is being made towards a thriving socialist state.
					
					 Byvor on April 1 devoted one whole page to an article titled "Ushering in great heyday of construction" and photos showing the Sci-Tech Complex, Mirae Scientists Street, the Youth Movement Museum and the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, illustrated with a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Tomskaya Nedeli on April 1 carried a special write-up with one whole page illustrated with a photo of the President.
					
					 In an article titled "Self-development of the DPRK" it noted that the self-development means the strength to grow oneself stronger and the self-development of the DPRK is rooted on the Juche idea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Indonesia
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was brought out in booklet by the Hekadaha Adicitra Publishing House of Indonesia on the occasion of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The work, published on Oct. 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the WPK represents the proud road in which it has taken responsible care of the people and led the Korean revolution to victory under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on April 7.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Concluding Speech at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on April 4 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) and the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The work published on March 31, Juche 102 (2013) deals with the validity of the fresh strategic line of simultaneously developing the economic construction and building of nuclear weapons set forth by the WPK and its intention.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Mahmoud Abbas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Mahmoud Abbas
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le remitiera el dia 13 Mahmoud Abbas, presidente del Estado de Palestina y presidente del comite ejecutivo de la Organizacion de Liberacion Palestina.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Me siento alegre por enviar a Vd. y por su conducto, al amistoso pueblo coreano la mas cordial felicitacion, con motivo del 104o aniversario del natalicio de Su Excelencia Presidente Kim Il Sung, eterno gran Lider y del 50o del establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas entre la RPDC y el Estado de Palestina.
					
					La RPDC, uno de los paises que establecieron relaciones diplomaticas con nuestro pais apoyo y ayudo activamente el derecho nacional de nuestro pueblo en todas las escenas internacionales desde antes del establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas y vino desarrollando las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y Palestina.
					
					En medio del apoyo y ayuda de nuestros hermanos y amigos con la RPDC al frente, el pueblo palestino que lucha por rescatar el derecho nacional y fundar un Estado independiente siente como orgullo sobre las relaciones historicas con vuestro pais amistoso y aprecia mucho la invariable posicion de vuestro pais sobre la justa causa del pueblo palestino.
					
					Envio la mas calida felicitacion a Su Excelencia y deseo de todo corazon la salud y la felicidad de Vd.
					
					Y formulo votos por mayor progreso y prosperidad del amistoso pueblo coreano y el desarrollo incesante de las relaciones de amistad y solidaridad entre los pueblos de ambos paises.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de presidente de Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de presidente de Myanmar
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- El Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le dedicara el dia 8 el Presidente de la Republica de la Union de Myanmar, Htin Kyat.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					En ocasion del 15 de abril de 2016, 104o cumpleanos de Su Excelencia Kim Il Sung, eterno Presidente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, tengo el honor de enviarle mi mas sincera felicitacion y maximo saludo a Su Excelencia, y por su conducto, al pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de presidente ugandes
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de presidente ugandes
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- El Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 6 el Presidente de la Republica de Uganda, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni.
					El texto senala:
					
					En ocasion del Dia del Sol, 104o aniversario de natalicio de Su Excelencia Kim Il Sung, gran Lider del pueblo coreano, extiendo a Vd., al gobierno y pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea las mas calurosas felicitaciones en nombre del gobierno y pueblo de la Republica de Uganda y en el mio propio.
					
					Con el servicio abnegado por el pueblo coreano, el gran Lider convirtio la RPDC en el pais mas unido y logro gran desarrollo socioeconomico.
					
					Elogiamos altamente la vida y las grandes proezas de Su Excelencia Kim Il Sung, gran Lider, y deseamos que sigan desarrollandose favorablemente las excelentes relaciones con Su Excelencia y el gobierno y pueblo de vuestro pais.
					
					Deseo a Su Excelencia buena salud y al pueblo coreano la prosperidad sostenida.

articles.title: MINREX rechaza "informe anual de DDHH" de EE.UU.
articles.content:
MINREX rechaza "informe anual de DDHH" de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que Estados Unidos publico el "informe anual de DDHH" con el contenido de calumnia a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 15 siguiente respuesta a la ACNC:
					En el "informe sobre la situacion de DDHH de cada pais en 2015", publicado el dia 13, el Departamento de Estado norteamericano volvio a cuestionar la situacion de DDHH de la RPDC con los datos fraudulentos e intrigantes. 
					
					La "privacion de libertad", "gestion del campo de concentracion de presos politicos", "ejecucion a discrecion", "trafico de seres  humanos", "trabajo forzoso" y otros fenomenos indicados en el "informe de DDHH" son pura mentira inexistente en la RPDC. 
					
					EE.UU. cuestiona cada ano el problema de DDHH de otros paises, pero el mismo es el violador de DDHH a sentarse en el banquillo de los acusados. 
					
					La sociedad estadounidense es el infierno de DDHH donde reinan la discriminacion racial, los crimenes de toda indole y los horribles casos de violacion de DDHH. 
					
					Por doquier de nuestro planeta el imperio americano comete sin escrupulos las atrocidades de lesa humanidad recurriendo a la agresion y la intervencion y asesinando a sus caprichos a los civiles inocentes. 
					
					Bajo el rotulo de la "defensa de DDHH", hizo la "revolucion de color" en el Medio Oriente causando el derrocamiento de Estado, el conflicto nacional, los desastres de guerra y el incidente de refugiados. 
					
					Sin embargo, actua ilogicamente como "juez de DDHH" a fin de ocultar su naturaleza como archi-violador de DDHH. 
					
					EE.UU. pronuncio disparates sobre la situacion de DDHH de 199 paises del mundo a pesar de que no tiene la calidad elemental de hablar sobre este tema, razon por la cual nadie le prestara atencion.
					
					Seria mejor que EE.UU. arregle primero sus asuntos internos dejando de recurrir al invento del "informe de DDHH".
					
					La peligrosidad de la publicacion del presente informe reside en que EE.UU. lo usa como aparato de agresion para derribar el regimen de otros paises y realizar su objetivo dominacionista.
					
					EE.UU. recurre persistentemente a la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC para realizar a toda costa su ambicion del "derrumbe de regimen" manchando nuestra imagen internacional y descomponiendo nuestro interior.
					
					Puesto que EE.UU. intensifica mas la presion sobre la RPDC cuestionando el supuesto "problema de DDHH" junto con la amenaza militar y las maniobras de sancion encaminadas al "derribo de regimen" de esta, tomaremos todas las contramedidas necesarias para que EE.UU. se arrepienta profundamente.

articles.title: Lanzados fuegos artificiales en cielo de Pyongyang en felicitacion a Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Lanzados fuegos artificiales en cielo de Pyongyang en felicitacion a Dia del Sol
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- Se realizo el dia 15 en esta capital el disparo de fuegos artificiales para festejar el dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Al caer el sol, la orilla del rio Taedong, la Plaza Kim Il Sung, la colina Mansu y el puente Okryu y otros lugares de la capital estaban llenos de trabajadores de varios estratos, jovenes y ninos escolares.
					
					Junto con la interpretacion de la cancion "!Viva el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung!", se lanzaron fuegos artificiales de distintos colores decorando hermosamente el cielo nocturno.
					
					En medio de las melodias de las canciones "Adelante, potencia invencible" y "Nuestra conviccion" se aparecieron las chispas de varios colores y tipos llevando al climax el ambiente de felicitacion como si mostrara al mundo la unidad monolitica del ejercito y pueblo en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: USECC denuncia represion a SNE de banda de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
USECC denuncia represion a SNE de banda de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que llega a la fase extremada la represion de la banda surcoreana de Park Geun-hye encaminada a exterminar el Sindicato Nacional de Ensenantes (SNE), el portavoz del Comite Central de la Union de Sindicatos de Educacion y Cultura de Corea hizo publica el dia 15 una declaracion.
					Despues de tomar el poder, la camarilla de Park Geun-hye cometio la represion atroz al SNE, revela la nota y continua:
					
					En enero pasado, instigo a la Corte Suprema a arrebatar la posicion legitima de esta entidad y ahora impide sus transacciones bancarias y obliga a deponer incondicionalmente al presidente y otros cuadros del sindicato. 
					
					Lo denunciamos severamente calificandolo de abierta represalia politica y violencia antidemocratica para eliminar a los ensenantes que rechazan la politica de educacion antipopular de las autoridades surcoreanas y demandan la educacion correcta, la justicia y la verdad. 
					
					La campana anti-SNE de la banda de Park Geun-hye resulta una intolerable violencia fascista para exterminar completamente a las fuerzas progresistas y democraticas surcoreanas que apoyan la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y exigen la democracia y la independencia de la sociedad. 
					
					Hoy dia, la defensa o no del SNE en el Sur de Corea se presenta como un grave problema que pierda o no la ultima esperanza en la democratizacion del circulo docente. 
					
					Sepultar lo mas pronto posible a la banda de Park Geun-hye que reprime a los educadores progresistas mediante la movilizacion de los aparatos de represion fascista es el atajo para defender la educacion justiciera y frenar el resurgimiento de la dominacion fascista de "Yusin" en el Sur de Corea. 
					
					Los habitantes de distintos estratos surcoreanos deben levantarse en la lucha por deponer del poder a la horda traidora fascista de Park Geun-hye y defender el SNE. 
					
					Todos los educadores de la RPDC enviaran siempre el apoyo total y solidaridad a la indoblegable lucha del SNE contra la politica de educacion antipopular de la banda de Park Geun-hye y por la autentica educacion, la democratizacion de la sociedad y la reunificacion de la patria.
